resources.string: Album officially released on October 8, 2013 by Miley Cirus. On the album mixed genres dance pop and pop with country, hip-hop and dubstep.

It is a compilation album of the American singer and actress Selena Gomez. For You only produced a single, "The Heart Wants What It Wants" that managed to become the second top 10 of Gomez on the Billboard Hot 100 list and had a favorable commercial reception.
It is the fourth album of study and first self-titled album of the American singer and composer Demi Lovato.
It is the second album of study of the British singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran, sent worldwide on June 20, 2014 under the record labels Asylum and Atlantic Records.

It is the ninth studio album by the rock band Skillet, which was released on August 5, 2016. The band collaborated with Brian Howes, Kevin Churko, Neal Avron Seth Mosley and TobyMac in the production of this album.

Afaz Natural launches its fourth album, which is named "Fear". The album was recorded and produced independently under the record label Base Recordz and VIP Recordz. This is consecrated as the most successful album so far.
Third album in his artistic career, after "Rap Consciousness" and "Words of the Soul". ALI defines this new material as a mixture of thoughts, ideas, experiences and musical rhythms.
It is the fifth studio album of the Colombian singer J Balvin, released on May 25, 2018 by the Infinity Music label and published by Universal Music.
It is the second album of the Puerto Rican singer and composer Ozuna, released on August 24, 2018.
It was released on May 23, 2006 to the market by the record label V.I. Music, and distributed by Machete Music and Universal Music Group.
